ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hello I am a 17 ranger and what your friend said about bows is not true you need to be good at archery because when u reach lvl 50 your main use in a raid
ygData.messageBody:
--- Richard Skelton <richards@...> wrote:
> Hi there!
>
> Are there any high level Rangers on this list that
> could tell me a little about Archery please? I
> created a Woodelf Ranger yesterday and planned to
> focus on this skill, but a friend has just told me
> that Archery is broken and serves no purpose but to
> pull albeit from great distances. I was hoping that
> a well developed archer, along with snare could do
> most damage to mobs before its arrival. If this not
> true I find it staggering. Its fine for casters to
> snare, DD and DoT - ie fighting from a distance, but
> not bow-wielders?
> Any advice and general observations would be kindly
> met
>
> Thanks
>
> Legless, 8 Ranger
>
> Aka Rykk Bloodfang, 52 Monk
>
>
>

hello

I am a 17 ranger and what your friend said about bows
is not true you need to be good at archery because
when u reach lvl 50 your main use in a raid is to
snare and shoot your bow. By then you should be able
to take a ctitical hit of 500 or more with your bow. I
sugesst getting a fletching kit and not buying arrows
already made and make your own it should take you that
long to get good at it and then you can fletch bow and
sell them for a pretty good amount of money.


=====
Josh Varner
Cis 172 student
part-time cook
336 creekwood ct.
746-6132
